Please connect with the relevant TA as follows:

1. **All course-related questions, except grading**: Please attend UG TA office hours for all course-related questions, except grading. UG TAs are **not** supposed to know your grade or score on any home work. Please find their office hours in the [spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11CRhOx_IYfyNOoI816QOUG6yTLPjOpeRtP0YoncGuOo/edit?usp=sharing)

2. **Grading-related queries**: Set up appointment with the graders for grading related queries only, and no other questions.

## Instructors

Making appointments: **Include STAT202 in the subject line!** Please provide your full availability for the day(s) you are available to meet.

*Do NOT expect a reply in the evenings or on weekends.*

**Section 20: Krish** is an Assistant Professor of Instruction for the Department of Statistics and Data Science at Northwestern University. He received his Ph.D in Industrial Engineering with a specialization in Statistics from Georgia Institute of Technology. Currently, his focus is on developing new statistical modeling methods, and applications.

Office hours: **After class** (for as long as students have questions) or **by appointment** (Use [zoom link](https://northwestern.zoom.us/j/4453742655) for virtual appointments). For setting up virtual appointments, you can directly block my calendar (i.e., send a calendar invite) with your desired meeting time. If I am unavailable at that time, I will propose another time. I am unavailable on Fridays.

Email: krish\@northwestern.edu
